title: Website Theme/reskin button
body:
The website is working well, with an update being worked on. 
There is a medium article about the upcoming theme update.
The theme of Y-Men and Mutants can be explored further.


[1] A 'Theme' button on ymen.finance to allow easy switching from different themed reskins of the website, made for each Mutant.

[2] published updates are the changes I want, I want only one website theme.

[3] Current website is fine and I want nothing changed. 

This vote does not guarantee any changes discussed. Symbolic vote on community opinion only. 2 week poll.
author: 0x225D29eb77a18a7E520c9bB431c5bd8B1bE376A5
